citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:24 pm on
02-MAY-17.
The licensee was contacted via telephone; no facility representative was available for a routine inspection. Optimal
hours and days for future inspections were discussed and agreed by the licensee and this inspector.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:24 pm on
02-MAY-17.
The licensee was contacted via telephone; no facility representative was available for a routine inspection.  Optimal
hours and days for future inspections were discussed and agreed by the licensee and this inspector.
